僫字的基本解释

僫
è
古同“恶”。

僫
wù

僫
wū
古同“恶”。

僫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［è］
［《廣韻》烏各切，入鐸，影。］
亦作“僫1”。亦作“悪1”。“恶1”的繁体字。
(1)罪过；罪恶。
(2)凶暴；凶险。
(3)威猛；猛烈。
(4)恶人，坏人。
(5)古人指不正之气。如邪恶鬼祟之类。
(6)丑陋；憔悴。
(7)粗劣；不好。
(8)污秽肮脏之物。特指粪便。
(9)腐败；凋谢。
(10)副词。表程度，相当于“甚”、“很”。
[②]［wù］
［《廣韻》烏路切，去暮，影。］
“亞2”的今字。亦作“僫2”。亦作“悪2”。“恶2”的繁体字。
(1)讨厌，憎恨。
(2)诽谤；中伤。
(3)畏惧。
(4)得罪；冒犯。
(5)忌讳。
[③]［wū］
［《廣韻》哀都切，平模，影。］
亦作“僫3”。亦作“悪3”。“恶3”的繁体字。
(1)疑问代词。相当于“何”、“安”、“怎麽”。
(2)叹词。
[④]［ě］
亦作“僫4”。亦作“悪4”。“恶4”的繁体字。
见“惡4心”。
[⑤]［hū］
［《集韻》荒胡

僫字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　僫； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页117第23
【集韻】俗惡字。

僫字的源字形

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
僫字的起名意思

暂无。

僫
Basic explanation of words
僫
è
Gu Tong is "evil".
僫
wù
僫
wū
Gu Tong is "evil".
僫
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [è]
["Guangyun" Wu Geqi, enter the priest, shadow. ]
Also known as "僫1". Also known as "悪1". "Evil 1" in traditional characters.
(1) Sin; sin.
(2) Violent; dangerous.
(3) Mighty; fierce.
(4) The wicked, the bad.
(5) The ancients referred to unhealthy spirits. Such as evil and sneaky.
(6) Ugly; haggard.
(7) Poor; not good.
(8) Dirty things. Especially feces.
(9) Corruption; withering.
(10) Adverbs. The expression level is equivalent to "very" and "very".
[②]［wù］
["Guangyun" Wuluqie, go to dusk, shadow. ]
The modern word for "亚2". Also known as "僫2". Also known as "悪2". "Evil 2" in traditional characters.
(1) Hate, hate.
(2) Defamation; slander.
(3) Fear.
(4) Offend; offend.
(5) Taboo.
[③]［wū］
["Guangyun" mourning all cut, flat model, shadow. ]
Also known as "僫3". Also known as "悪3". "Evil 3" in traditional characters.
(1) Interrogative pronouns. It is equivalent to "He", "An", and "How".
(2) Interjection.
[④] [ě]
Also known as "僫4". Also known as "Epi 4". "Evil 4" in traditional characters.
See "Disgusting 4 Hearts".
[⑤]［hū］
["Ji Yun" Huang Hu
